inputs.description: A collection of arguments for invoking getRegexPatternSet.

name.description: Name of the WAFv2 Regex Pattern Set.

scope.description: Specifies whether this is for an AWS CloudFront distribution or for a regional application. Valid values are `CLOUDFRONT` or `REGIONAL`. To work with CloudFront, you must also specify the region `us-east-1` (N. Virginia) on the AWS provider.

outputs.description: A collection of values returned by getRegexPatternSet.

description.description: Description of the set that helps with identification.

id.description: The provider-assigned unique ID for this managed resource.

regularExpressions.description: One or more blocks of regular expression patterns that AWS WAF is searching for. See Regular Expression below for details.
